snippet: A county health official said doctors were advising some patients not to drink tap water, weeks, after it was deemed safe from a chemical contamination.
lead_paragraph: A county health official said doctors were advising some patients not to drink tap water, weeks, after it was deemed safe from a chemical contamination.

headline.main: West Virginia: Doctors Still Warning Some About Water
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Doctors Still Warning Some About Water

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
